page.title: 18TOURISM GWEEK SEAL SANCTUARY
page.content: The Gweek Seal Sanctuary is popular as a tourist attraction.It has five pools,each holding three to seven seals.There is two hospital pools.The first hospital pool holds baby seals of four to six months.These seals have just been brought down from the hospital.The second hospital pool holds older seals,that are hopefully going to be put back into the sea soon.The first hospital holds three seals,the second holds six.The weaning pool holds seals aged about twelve.This pool holds seven seals.The isolation pool holds five seals.The resident pool holds four seals.The Gweek Seal Sanctuary was opened in 1958/59.There is a hospital near the car park,for badly injured seals.The sanctuary is run by Mr and Mrs Jones.
